description.value:
Element water; Type utility (Su); Level 2; Burn 0

You create a misty veil over your features, disguising yourself as @Compendium[pf1.spells.oj36nfak6jc2s5ky]{Disguise Self} for a number of minutes equal to your Constitution modifier.

If you accept 1 point of burn, until the next time your burn is removed, each use of this wild talent lasts until you dismiss it.
